languages.text: "Осторожнее со словами. Аребенниан любят понимать слова так, как они прозвучали, а не так, как ты хотел их сказать".

traits.locale_text: "Осторожнее со словами. Аребенниан любят понимать слова так, как они прозвучали, а не так, как ты хотел их сказать".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Watch your words. Arebennian love nothing more than interpreting words superficially, and not how they were intended."
languages.original_text: "Осторожнее со словами. Аребенниан любят понимать слова так, как они прозвучали, а не так, как ты хотел их сказать".

traits.locale_text: "Watch your words. Arebennian love nothing more than interpreting words superficially, and not how they were intended."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Watch your words. Arebennian love nothing more than interpreting words superficially, and not how they were intended."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Watch your words. Arebennian love nothing more than interpreting words superficially, and not how they were intended."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Watch your words. Arebennian love nothing more than interpreting words superficially, and not how they were intended."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “说话一定要当心。独角最喜欢做的事情，就是按照字面意义上理解别人的话，完全无视原本的意图。”
languages.original_text: "Watch your words. Arebennian love nothing more than interpreting words superficially, and not how they were intended."

traits.locale_text: “说话一定要当心。独角最喜欢做的事情，就是按照字面意义上理解别人的话，完全无视原本的意图。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Cuida tus palabras. Nada deleita más a los Arebennian que interpretar lo que se dice de forma superficial, ignorando sus intenciones originales».
languages.original_text: "Watch your words. Arebennian love nothing more than interpreting words superficially, and not how they were intended."

traits.locale_text: «Cuida tus palabras. Nada deleita más a los Arebennian que interpretar lo que se dice de forma superficial, ignorando sus intenciones originales».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「何を言うか慎重に考えろ。アーベニアンは言葉の真の意図を理解するより、表面的に解釈することを何よりも好むぞ」
languages.original_text: "Watch your words. Arebennian love nothing more than interpreting words superficially, and not how they were intended."

traits.locale_text: 「何を言うか慎重に考えろ。アーベニアンは言葉の真の意図を理解するより、表面的に解釈することを何よりも好むぞ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Achtet auf Eure Worte. Arebennian lieben nichts mehr, als Worte oberflächlich zu deuten, nicht nach ihrem beabsichtigten Inhalt."
languages.original_text: "Watch your words. Arebennian love nothing more than interpreting words superficially, and not how they were intended."

traits.locale_text: "Achtet auf Eure Worte. Arebennian lieben nichts mehr, als Worte oberflächlich zu deuten, nicht nach ihrem beabsichtigten Inhalt."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Faites attention à ce que vous dites. Les Arebennians prennent grand plaisir à interpréter les mots superficiellement, sans tenir compte des intentions de la personne qui les prononce. »
languages.original_text: "Watch your words. Arebennian love nothing more than interpreting words superficially, and not how they were intended."

traits.locale_text: « Faites attention à ce que vous dites. Les arebennians prennent grand plaisir à interpréter les mots superficiellement, sans tenir compte des intentions de la personne qui les prononce. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Söylediklerine dikkat et. Arebennianlar; söylenenleri asıl kastedildikleri şekilde değil, yüzeysel olarak yorumlamaya bayılır."
languages.original_text: "Watch your words. Arebennian love nothing more than interpreting words superficially, and not how they were intended."

traits.locale_text: "Söylediklerine dikkat et. Arebennianlar, söylenen kelimeleri asıl kastedildikleri şekilde değil, yüzeysel olarak yorumlamaya bayılır."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
